{{Disambig}}

'''Computer Edition''' may refer to the following ''Minecraft'' editions:
* {{JE}}, the original version of ''Minecraft'' for Windows, macOS, and Linux.
* {{BE}}, the version of ''Minecraft'' that supports cross-platform play between different platforms, including Windows and ChromeOS.
* {{el|ee}}, the education version of ''Minecraft'' for Windows, macOS, ChromeOS, Android, iOS, and iPadOS.
* {{el|ce}}, the mainland China version of ''Minecraft'' for Windows, Android, iOS, iPadOS, and macOS.
* ''[[Minecraft 4k]]'': the under 4 kibibytes version of the game made for the {{w|Java 4K Game Programming Contest|2010 Java 4K contest}}.
* {{el|mcedu}}, the discontinued education version of ''Minecraft'' for Windows, macOS, and Linux.
* {{os|pi}} {{el|pi}}, the discontinued version of ''Minecraft'' for the Raspberry Pi.
* {{os|w10}} {{el|Windows 10}}, the former title of ''Bedrock Edition'' on Windows.
